00056         CheckBox::CheckBox(ConstString& name, Vector2 Position, Vector2 Size, Whole Glyph, ConstString &LabelText, UILayer* Layer)
00057             : Widget(name,Layer),
00058               GlyphIndex(Glyph),
00059               Checked(false),
00060               CheckLock(true)
00061         {
00062             Type = Widget::CheckBox;
00063             RelPosition = Position;
00064             RelSize = Size;
00065 
00066             Box = new Button(Name+"CB",Position,Size,Layer);
00067             if(LabelText.empty())
00068             {
00069                 Label = NULL;
00070             }else{
00071                 Position.X+=Size.X;
00072                 Label = new MarkupText(Name+"CM",Position,GlyphIndex,LabelText,Layer);
00073             }
00074         }
00075 
00076         CheckBox::~CheckBox()
00077         {
00078             delete Box;
00079             if(Label)
00080                 delete Label;
00081         }
00082 
00083         void CheckBox::SetSpriteSet(std::pair<std::string,std::string>& SpriteSet)
00084         {
00085             Box->SetBackgroundSprite(SpriteSet.first);
00086             if(!SpriteSet.second.empty())
00087                 Box->SetHoveredSprite(SpriteSet.second);
00088         }

00097         void CheckBox::SetCheckedSprites()
00098         {
00099             Box->SetBackgroundSprite(CheckedNorm);

00104         void CheckBox::Update(bool Force)
00105         {
00106             if(HoveredButton || Force)
00107             {
00108                 MetaCode::ButtonState State = Manager->GetInputQueryer()->GetMouseButtonState(1);
00109                 if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State)
00110                 {
00111                     CheckLock = false;
00112                 }
00113                 else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_LIFTING && !CheckLock)
00114                 {
00115                     Checked = !Checked;
00116                     if(Checked)
00117                     {
00118                         SetSpriteSet(CheckedSet);
00119                     }else{
00120                         SetSpriteSet(UncheckedSet);
00121                     }
00122                     CheckLock = true;
00123                 }
00124             }
00125         }
00126 
00127         void CheckBox::SetVisible(bool visible)
00128         {
00129             Box->SetVisible(visible);
00130             if(Label)
00131                 Label->SetVisible(visible);
00132             Visible = visible;
00133         }
00134 
00135         bool CheckBox::IsVisible()
00136         {
00137             return Visible;
00138         }
00139 
00140         void CheckBox::Show()
00141         {
00142             Box->Show();
00143             if(Label)
00144                 Label->Show();
00145             Visible = true;
00146         }
00147 
00148         void CheckBox::Hide()
00149         {
00150             Box->Hide();
00151             if(Label)
00152                 Label->Hide();
00153             Visible = false;
00154         }
00155 
00156         bool CheckBox::IsChecked()
00157         {
00158             return Checked;
00159         }
00160 
00161         void CheckBox::ManualCheck(bool Check)
00162         {
00163             if(Checked==Check)
00164                 return;
00165             Checked = Check;
00166             if(Checked)
00167             {
00168                 SetSpriteSet(CheckedSet);
00169             }else{
00170                 SetSpriteSet(UncheckedSet);
00171             }
00172         }
00173 
00174         bool CheckBox::CheckMouseHover()
00175         {
00176             if(!Visible)
00177                 return false;
00178             if(Box->CheckMouseHover())
00179             {
00180                 HoveredButton = Box;
00181                 //Update();
00182                 return true;
00183             }
00184             HoveredButton = NULL;
00185             return false;
00186         }
00187 
00188         void CheckBox::SetLabelText(String &LabelText)
00189         {
00190             if(!Label)
00191             {
00192                 Vector2 Position = Box->GetPosition();
00193                 Position.X+=Box->GetSize().X;
00194                 Label = new MarkupText(Name+"CM",Position,GlyphIndex,LabelText,Parent);
00195                 Label->SetVisible(Box->IsVisible());
00196             }else{
00197                 Label->SetText(LabelText);
00198             }
00199         }
00200 
00201         String CheckBox::GetLabelText()
00202         {
00203             if(!Label)
00204             {
00205                 String Text = "";
00206                 return Text;
00207             }else{
00208                 return Label->GetText();
00209             }
00210         }

00212         void CheckBox::SetUncheckedSprite(ConstString& Unchecked, ConstString& Hovered)
00213         {
00214             UncheckedSet.first = Unchecked;
00215             UncheckedSet.second = Hovered;
00216             //UncheckedNorm = Unchecked;
00217             //UncheckedHovered = Hovered;
00218         }
00219 
00220         void CheckBox::SetCheckedSprite(ConstString& Checked, ConstString& Hovered)
00221         {
00222             CheckedSet.first = Checked;
00223             CheckedSet.second = Hovered;
00224             //CheckedNorm = Checked;
00225             //CheckedHovered = Hovered;
00226         }

00228         void CheckBox::SetPosition(Vector2 Position)
00229         {
00230             RelPosition = Position;
00231             Box->SetPosition(Position);
00232             if(Label)
00233             {
00234                 Position.X+=Box->GetSize().X;
00235                 Label->SetPosition(Position);
00236             }
00237         }
00238 
00239         Vector2 CheckBox::GetPosition()
00240         {
00241             return RelPosition;
00242         }
00243 
00244         void CheckBox::SetActualPosition(Vector2 Position)
00245         {
00246             RelPosition = Position / Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00247             Box->SetActualPosition(Position);
00248             if(Label)
00249             {
00250                 Position.X+=Box->GetSize().X;
00251                 Label->SetActualPosition(Position);
00252             }
00253         }
00254 
00255         Vector2 CheckBox::GetActualPosition()
00256         {
00257             return RelPosition * Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00258         }
00259 
00260         void CheckBox::SetSize(Vector2 Size)
00261         {
00262             RelSize = Size;
00263             Box->SetSize(Size);
00264             if(Label)
00265             {
00266                 Size.X+=Box->GetPosition().X;
00267                 Label->SetPosition(Size);
00268             }
00269         }
00270 
00271         Vector2 CheckBox::GetSize()
00272         {
00273             return RelSize;
00274         }
00275 
00276         void CheckBox::SetActualSize(Vector2 Size)
00277         {
00278             RelSize = Size / Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00279             Box->SetActualSize(Size);
00280             if(Label)
00281             {
00282                 Size.X+=Box->GetActualPosition().X;
00283                 Label->SetActualPosition(Size);
00284             }
00285         }
00286 
00287         Vector2 CheckBox::GetActualSize()
00288         {
00289             return RelSize * Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00290         }
